categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic
Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Maris Csayni was a Human female agent of Imperial Intelligence during the Galactic War.

Maris Csayni was created for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, as a quest giver for Imperial players on Taris in the New Tarisian Dawn skyscraper. However, the entire New Tarisian Dawn area was removed prior to release due to severe memory leaks and other glitches in the area, and Csayni was cut along with the quests in the skyscraper.
